name: BNNSLayerParametersLossHuber
desc: A structure that contains the parameters of a Huber loss layer.

items.name: init(function: BNNSLossFunction, i_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, o_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, reduction: BNNSLossReductionFunction, huber_delta: Float)
items.desc: Returns a new Huber loss layer parameters structure from the specified parameters.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Returns a new Huber loss layer parameters structure.

items.name: var function: BNNSLossFunction
items.desc: The function that’s used to compute loss.

items.name: var reduction: BNNSLossReductionFunction
items.desc: The function that’s used to reduce the computed loss.

items.name: var huber_delta: Float
items.desc: The boundary value that defines where Huber loss returns mean absolute error or mean square error.
